xxl.core.indexStructures
Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Sphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Descriptor, Convertable
public class Sphere
extends Object
implements Descriptor, Convertable

This class implements a Descriptor that is a sphere. This class is used in the @link xxl.core.indexStructures.MTree MTree}.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
protected  Object center
          The center of the sphere.
protected  Converter centerConverter
          A suitable converter for the center of the sphere.
protected  double distanceToParent
          The distance from the center of this sphere to the center of the sphere of the parent node in the MTree.
protected  Distance pointDistance
          The metric distance function for points.
protected  double radius
          The radius if the sphere.
protected  Distance sphereDistance
          The metric distance function for spheres.

read

public void read(DataInput dataInput)
          throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Convertable
Reads the state (the attributes) for an object of this class from the specified data input and restores the calling object. The state of the object before calling read will be lost.
The read method must read the values in the same sequence and with the same types as were written by write.

Specified by:
read in interface Convertable
Parameters:
dataInput - the stream to read data from in order to restore the object.
Throws:
IOException - if I/O errors occur.

centerDistance

public double centerDistance(Sphere sphere)
Computes the distance between the center of this and the center of the specified sphere using the MTree.pointDistance.

Parameters:
sphere - the sphere to whichs center the distance should be determined
Returns:
the distance between the center of this and the center of sphere

overlaps

public boolean overlaps(Descriptor descriptor)
Returns true if this sphere overlaps the specified sphere.

Specified by:
overlaps in interface Descriptor
Parameters:
descriptor - the sphere to check
Returns:
true if this sphere overlaps the specified sphere

overlapsPD

public boolean overlapsPD(Descriptor descriptor)
Returns true if this sphere overlaps the specified sphere. This implementation uses an optimization: If the difference of distances to the center of the parent node of the spheres is greater than the sum of their radiuses, the spheres cannot overlap. This case can be detected using distanceToParent.

Parameters:
descriptor - the sphere to check
Returns:
true if this sphere overlaps the specified sphere

contains

public boolean contains(Descriptor descriptor)
Returns true if this sphere contains the specified sphere.

Specified by:
contains in interface Descriptor
Parameters:
descriptor - the sphere to check
Returns:
true if this sphere contains the specified sphere

containsPD

public boolean containsPD(Descriptor descriptor)
Returns true if this sphere contains the specified sphere. This implementation uses an optimization: If the difference of distances to the center of the parent node of the spheres is greater than the sum of their radiuses, the spheres cannot overlap and i.e. not contain each other. This case can be detected using distanceToParent.

Parameters:
descriptor - the sphere to check
Returns:
true if this sphere contains the specified sphere

public void union(Descriptor descriptor)
Description copied from interface: Descriptor
Unions this descriptor with the specified Descriptor. The Descriptor the method is invoked on will be changed to represent the union.

union in interface Descriptor
